mapper.select: select cust_id , cust_num , cust_nm , FN_DECRYPT(hand_tel, #{schema_en_key}) as hand_tel , class_1 , class_2 , class_3 , class_4 , class_5 from TB_CUST where cust_id = #{cust_id} limit 1
select team_cd , team_name from TB_TEAM_MST where is_delete = 'N'
select concat(tmr_id) as tmr_id , tmr_nm , team_cd from TB_TMR where is_su = 'N' and is_manager = 'N' and is_delete = 'N'
select count(call_id) as cnt from TB_CALLRESULT where 1=1 and call_id = #{call_id}
select concat(max(cr_sno)+1) as cr_sno from TB_CALLRESULT where 1=1 and call_id = #{call_id}
